verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earthly \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w control|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* surrounding \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, told \w Jeremiah|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* speak \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* tell \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w grasp|strong="H8610"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w captured|strong="H8610"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w go|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Babylon.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*: \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*;

\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*. \w As|strong="H1697"\w* spices \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w preceded|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* spices \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w*, ‘\w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* master!’ \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* Myself \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w then|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* relayed \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*

\w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*—\w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H2007"\w* \w were|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*

\w that|strong="H3064"\w* each \w man|strong="H5680"\w* \w should|strong="H5650"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*, both \w male|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w female|strong="H8198"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* one \w should|strong="H5650"\w* hold \w his|strong="H7971"\w* fellow \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* entered into \w this|strong="H8085"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w agreed|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w maidservants|strong="H8198"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* hold \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*. \w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w released|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3651"\w* later \w they|strong="H3651"\w* changed \w their|strong="H7725"\w* minds \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w maidservants|strong="H8198"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w had|strong="H8198"\w* \w freed|strong="H2670"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w forced|strong="H3533"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w become|strong="H7725"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* forefathers \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*, saying:

\w Every|strong="H7971"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, each \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* brother \w who|strong="H4376"\w* \w has|strong="H7093"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H8085"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w then|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* fathers \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w Recently|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w repented|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w pleased|strong="H5869"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* freedom \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* bears \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* changed \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w minds|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* \w My|strong="H7971"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. Each \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w maidservants|strong="H8198"\w* whom \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w liberty|strong="H2670"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* wherever \w they|strong="H5315"\w* wanted, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w forced|strong="H3533"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*: \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*; \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* freedom, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*. \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w now|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* freedom \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—freedom \w to|strong="H3068"\w* fall \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w plague|strong="H1698"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*! \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horror|strong="H2113"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* those \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w terms|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* treat \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w order|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w between|strong="H5674"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* pieces.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H5631"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w between|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*,
